summary.Title: Hotel rengøring

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
We are looking for a new colleague to join our housekeeping team at Skovshoved Hotel, located 7 km north of Copenhagen, starting soon as possible. 

Skovshoved Hotel is a small and cozy sea side hotel located in the old fishing village of Skovshoved (Gentofte municipality). We have 22 rooms, a restaurant and meeting / conference facilities.  

Together with the rest of the Housekeeping Team, you will be responsible for the daily cleaning of the hotel rooms, common areas and the meeting rooms.
It is preferred that you have a minimum of 1 year of experience from similar work, but it is not a requirement.

We are searching for two colleagues: One colleague to work min. 100 hours pr month/ app. 23 hours per week and one colleague to work part time 44 hours/about 12 hours a week.

The working days are divided on weekdays as well as weekends between 07:00 – 15:00

Main Tasks:

  • Cleaning hotel/guest rooms, public areas, bathrooms, conference rooms
  • Handling the various linen depots and keeping things in order

 

We expect:

  • You have minimum 1 year experience from a similar job
  • You are thorough and quality conscious in your work, and have an eye for details.
  • You speak Danish or English in an understandable level
  • You are flexible to work weekends and early mornings
  • You are a team player

 

We offer:

  • Training / instruction for the job
  • Be part of an engaged hotel team and housekeeping team
  • A good and positive working environment
  • Easy access, (bus no. 23 stops right in front of the hotel)

 

You are

You are a positive and service minded person who greets our guest with a smile. You have good collaboration skills and like working with structure.

If you have further questions about the position, you can call Housekeeping Manager Tanya Chambers.

Please send an E-mail with your application, resume and any references you may have to tc@skovshovedhotel.com, Att.: Tanya Chambers (Mobile 91 92 97 28) or you are welcome to call us
at 39 64 00 28 if any questions.

Application deadline: as soon as possible
Date of employment: as soon as possible
